mapper.select: SELECT SELLER_ID, NVL(SELLER_NAME,'') SELLER_NAME, NVL(SELLER_NUMBER,'') SELLER_NUMBER, NVL(SELLER_PASSWORD,'') SELLER_PASSWORD, NVL(SELLER_BUSINESS, '') SELLER_BUSINESS, NVL(SELLER_EMAIL, '') SELLER_EMAIL, NVL(SELLER_STATUS, 'N') SELLER_STATUS, NVL(TO_CHAR(SELLER_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') SELLER_REGDATE, NVL(SELLER_SELLNUMBER,'') SELLER_SELLNUMBER FROM T_SELLER WHERE SELLER_ID = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SELLER ( SELLER_ID, SELLER_NAME, SELLER_NUMBER, SELLER_PASSWORD, SELLER_BUSINESS, SELLER_EMAIL, SELLER_STATUS, SELLER_REGDATE, SELLER_SELLNUMBER ) VALUES ( #{sellerId}, #{sellerName}, #{sellerNumber}, #{sellerPassword}, #{sellerBusiness}, #{sellerEmail}, 'N', SYSDATE, #{sellerSellnumber})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_SELLER SET SELLER_NUMBER = #{sellerNumber}, SELLER_BUSINESS = #{sellerBusiness}, SELLER_EMAIL = #{sellerEmail}, SELLER_REGDATE = SYSDATE, SELLER_SELLNUMBER = #{sellerSellnumber} WHERE SELLER_ID = #{sellerId}
